Commented Whitney Daane, Sr. VP Creative of Kobalt: "Songs like 'Somewhere With You' are truly a writer and publisher's dream, especially when they are three weeks at No.1 with Kenny Chesney. Shane has worked so hard to get to this place, and we are very proud to have him with us at Kobalt." 

Currently McAnally has been collaborating with artists Carrie Underwood, Uncle Kracker, Jake Owen, Luke Bryan, Dierks Bentley, Ashton Shepherd, Kristin Chenoweth and Chris Young on material for upcoming releases.
